articles.author: Jan Cronje
articles.title: British American Tobacco to retrench even more SA workers as its cigarette sales fall 40% - News24
articles.description: SA's largest tobacco manufacturer, British American Tobacco SA, says falls in cigarette sales mean it may have to cut another 200 jobs at its local operations.
articles.content:
South Africa's largest tobacco manufacturer, British American Tobacco SA (BATSA), says falling cigarette sales mean it may have to cut another 200 jobs at its local operations. 
Since 2020, the comp… [+1533 chars]

articles.title: Close call as two packed planes almost collide on runway at New York's JFK airport - CBS News
articles.description: Officials are probing the incident involving an American Airlines plane that was crossing a runway and a Delta Air Lines jetliner that was preparing for takeoff. Both were packed.
articles.content: Officials are investigating a close call at a New York airport Friday night between a plane that was crossing a runway and another that was preparing for takeoff. CBS New York reports both were "full… [+3333 chars]

articles.title: Miss USA R'Bonney Gabriel, a Filipino-American, wins Miss Universe competition - Channel NewsAsia
articles.description: Gabriel is a former high school volleyball player and graduate of the University of North Texas. A short bio posted on the Miss Universe website said she is also CEO of her own sustainable clothing line.
articles.content: In the Q&A at the last stage of the competition for the three finalists, Gabriel was asked how she would work to demonstrate Miss Universe is an empowering and progressive organisation if she wer… [+1257 chars]

articles.title: Miss USA R'Bonney Gabriel wins Miss Universe Competition - CP24
articles.description: R'Bonney Gabriel, a fashion designer, model and sewing instructor from Texas who competition officials said is the first Filipino American to win Miss USA, was crowned Miss Universe on Saturday night.
articles.content: NEW ORLEANS (AP) - R'Bonney Gabriel, a fashion designer, model and sewing instructor from Texas who competition officials said is the first Filipino American to win Miss USA, was crowned Miss Univers… [+2284 chars]
